info.title: Medivoy Healthcare API - Enhanced Documentation
info.description: Comprehensive healthcare management API with detailed documentation for all endpoints. This API provides complete functionality for patient management, appointment scheduling, doctor profiles, hospital operations, and more.

get.description:
Retrieve a list of analytics with support for pagination, search, and filtering. Returns detailed information for each item. 

**Use Cases:**
- Standard CRUD operations
- Data synchronization
- Integration with external systems
- Compliance and auditing

404.description: Not Found - Resource does not exist

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded
